attributes.action: enforce the education of all politicians on the dangers of drugs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has demonstrated the governments complete lack of knowledge on cannabis. 

The government constantly ignores the advise of experts and base their decisions off their highly uneducated and ignorant opinions. 

I propose that the government have extensive training on the dangers of all drugs, legal and illeagal so they can make educated and informed decisions. 

The government needs to relise that alot of legal prescription drugs are more dangerous than cannabis and extacsy, their being hypocritical and making themselve look extremely foolish by demonising cannabis.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
